We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AwesomeOscillator _ao;
// In Initialize()
_ao = AO(symbol, slowPeriod, fastPeriod, type);

// In OnData()
if (_ao.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "AO Slow Ao", _ao.SlowAo);
    Plot("My Indicators", "AO Fast Ao", _ao.FastAo);
    Plot("My Indicators", "AO Current", _ao.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.ao = self.AO(symbol, slowPeriod, fastPeriod, type)

# In OnData()
if self.ao.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AO Slow Ao", self.ao.SlowAo);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AO Fast Ao", self.ao.FastAo);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AO Current", self.ao.Current);
